title: NODDLE: Node2vec based deep learning model for link prediction. (arXiv:2305.16421v1 [cs.SI])
abstract: Computing the probability of an edge's existence in a graph network is known as link prediction. While traditional methods calculate the similarity between two given nodes in a static network, recent research has focused on evaluating networks that evolve dynamically. Although deep learning techniques and network representation learning algorithms, such as node2vec, show remarkable improvements in prediction accuracy, the Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD) method of node2vec tends to fall into a mediocre local optimum value due to a shortage of prior network information, resulting in failure to capture the global structure of the network. To tackle this problem, we propose NODDLE (integration of NOde2vec anD Deep Learning mEthod), a deep learning model which incorporates the features extracted by node2vec and feeds them into a four layer hidden neural network. NODDLE takes advantage of adaptive learning optimizers such as Adam, Adamax, Adadelta, and Adagrad to improve the performance of

Title: NODDLE: Node2vec based deep learning model for link prediction. (arXiv:2305.16421v1 [cs.SI])
Abstract: Computing the probability of an edge's existence in a graph network is known as link prediction. While traditional methods calculate the similarity between two given nodes in a static network, recent research has focused on evaluating networks that evolve dynamically. Although deep learning techniques and network representation learning algorithms, such as node2vec, show remarkable improvements in prediction accuracy, the Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD) method of node2vec tends to fall into a mediocre local optimum value due to a shortage of prior network information, resulting in failure to capture the global structure of the network. To tackle this problem, we propose NODDLE (integration of NOde2vec anD Deep Learning mEthod), a deep learning model which incorporates the features extracted by node2vec and feeds them into a four layer hidden neural network. NODDLE takes advantage of adaptive learning optimizers such as Adam, Adamax, Adadelta, and Adagrad to improve the performance of
translated_title: NODDLE：基于Node2vec的深度学习模型的链路预测
translated_abstract: 链路预测是计算图网络中边存在概率的过程。传统方法计算静态网络中给定节点的相似度，而最近的研究侧重于评估动态演化的网络。尽管深度学习技术和网络表示学习算法（例如node2vec）在预测准确性方面表现出卓越的改进，但node2vec中的随机梯度下降（SGD）方法由于缺乏先前的网络信息而易陷入平庸的本地最优值，导致无法捕捉网络的全局结构。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了NODDLE（NOde2vec和Deep Learning mEthod的集成）深度学习模型，该模型融合了node2vec提取的特征，并将其馈送到四层隐藏神经网络中。NODDLE利用自适应学习优化器（如Adam，Adamax，Adadelta和Adagrad）来提高性能。
tldr: NODDLE是一种用于链路预测的深度学习模型，结合了node2vec提取的特征和四层隐藏神经网络，并利用自适应学习优化器提高性能。
en_tdlr: NODDLE is a deep learning model for link prediction that combines the features extracted by node2vec with a four layer hidden neural network, and uses adaptive learning optimizers to improve performance.
